articles.description: Justin Hemmes has guaranteed his former partner Kate Fowler and their two children will live in luxury — but there are a few conditions that need to be met.
articles.content:
Sydney bar baron Justin Hemmes may have bought his ex Kate Fowler a $7.5m mansion in Sydney's eastern suburbs - but it still came with some strings attached.

articles.title: For Apple, smart things come in small packages - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: If you're keen to chat with Siri, but don't need to rock the house, there might be room in your life for Apple's pint-sized HomePod Mini.
